title: Election 2016 exit polls : percentage of votes by gender
summary: This grouped bar chart shows Percentage of votes on the Y-axis for 2 different Sexs for 2 groups Hillary Clinton, and Donald Trump that are presented on the X-axis.
Sex Female had the maximum Percentage of votes among all 2 groups, and it was for Hillary Clinton. The minimum Percentage of votes was observed in Sex Male for Hillary Clinton.
In Sex Female, Hillary Clinton had the highest Percentage of votes among all 2 Sexs and it has the lowest Percentage of votes in Sex Male.
There is a gap of 13.0 between the highest and lowest Percentage of votes found for Hillary Clinton in Sex Female and Male.
min_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 2 different Sexs on X-axis for 2 groups Hillary Clinton, and Donald Trump. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Percentage of votes.
Out of all 2 groups, Hillary Clinton had the highest Percentage of votes in Sex Female and Hillary Clinton had the lowest Percentage of votes in Sex Male.
mid_summary: This grouped bar chart shows Percentage of votes on the Y-axis for 2 different Sexs for 2 groups Hillary Clinton, and Donald Trump that are presented on the X-axis.
Sex Female had the maximum Percentage of votes among all 2 groups, and it was for Hillary Clinton. The minimum Percentage of votes was observed in Sex Male for Hillary Clinton.
In Sex Female, Hillary Clinton had the highest Percentage of votes among all 2 Sexs and it has the lowest Percentage of votes in Sex Male.
There is a gap of 13.0 between the highest and lowest Percentage of votes found for Hillary Clinton in Sex Female and Male.
max_summary: This grouped bar chart shows Percentage of votes on the Y-axis for 2 different Sexs for 2 groups Hillary Clinton, and Donald Trump that are presented on the X-axis.
Sex Female had the maximum Percentage of votes among all 2 groups, and it was for Hillary Clinton. The minimum Percentage of votes was observed in Sex Male for Hillary Clinton.
Among all the Sexs, Hillary Clinton had the highest Percentage of votes in Sex Female and lowest Percentage of votes in Sex Male.
The maximum Percentage of votes for Hillary Clinton that was found in Sex Female was 1.32 times larger than the minimum Percentage of votes observed in Sex Male.
Out of all 2 groups, the highest gap between the maximum and minimum Percentage of votes was found in case of Hillary Clinton.
Averaging all 2 groups Hillary Clinton, and Donald Trump, the Sex Female is the maximum Percentage of votes and Male is the minimum Percentage of votes.
